information.description: By accessing or using [Dating App Name], you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the app.

information.heading: Registration

information.heading: Account Security
information.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access or use of your account.
